Text:
to fix the sound issue some experience in Windows 7 or Windows 8, simply download and install OpenAL.
it is the oalinst software package located here:
http://connect.creativelabs.com/openal/Downloads/Forms/AllItems.aspx

mirror:
http://bayfiles.net/file/PtKv/a8Zkjm/oalinst.zip
Also, be sure to run the game executable in compatibility mode for Windows XP SP3 and run as administrator. This should fix any issues with Windows 7 or 8.
I install the iso with a magic-disc. When the setup is all done and i go into the 2k folder and into the release folder to run the exe file. It just says I need to enter a serial-code. Please help
Nvm, Just had to unpack the iso file to get the crack durr :P
Is this updated with the patch 1.1?
And is this multilaguage (English, Spanish, etc.)?
Is it updated with patch 1.1 and multilanguage (English, Spanish, etc.)?

it is multilanguage. if you want patch v1.1, download worldwide retail patch:
http://www.bioshockgame.com/support/
http://bayfiles.net/file/PLRh/Qwadnn/bioshock_v1.1_patch.exe

move the game executable to the folder the patcher looks at and install it before cracking. then you will need to use DETONATiON v1.1 crack instead of the ViTALiTY crack.
http://bayfiles.net/file/PLR5/piuQso/Bioshock.exe

the game's save files are in a folder in My Documents, if you need to back them up.
